comment.text: This translation key is used to display a category label in a UI component, specifically in a row container within a settings page, allowing users to toggle the "Feedback and Support" feature on or off.

usage.context:
<RowContainer>
 <Checkbox label={t("Chat")} onChange={() => {}} isChecked />
 <Text color="gray">({t("InLeftPanel")})</Text>
 </RowContainer>
 <RowContainer>
 <Checkbox label={t("FeedbackAndSupport")} onChange={() => {}} isChecked />
 <Text color="gray">({t("InLeftPanel")})</Text>
 </RowContainer>
 </InterfaceElements>
 <CategorySubHeader>{t("AddWatermarks")}</CategorySubHeader>
 <ControlsGroup>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Əlaqə" can translate to 'Contact', 'Feedback&Support' implies more than just contact. It suggests a system for providing feedback and receiving support. "Dəstək" translates to 'Support' which is accurate, but 'Əlaqə' doesn't fully capture 'Feedback'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that incorporates both feedback and support, such as "Rəy & Dəstək" (Rəy means feedback) or "Geri Bildirim & Dəstək" (Geri Bildirim means feedback)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ຄໍາຕິຊົມແລະສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ" is a literal translation, "Feedback&Support" often implies a combined function or area. A more accurate translation might consider a single term capturing both.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄໍາເຫັນແລະສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (Kham hen lae sap sap nuan) - Opinion and Support

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses Lao script which is appropriate, but consistency with other translations (if any) should be verified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A - Check for overall consistency in script usage.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ" accurately translates to "Feedback", "හා" means "and" which is already represented in the English original with the '&'. It's more natural to use a different conjunction or restructure the sentence to avoid redundancy. A more natural translation might be 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණය සහ සහාය'.

While 'Повратне информације' is a valid translation of 'Feedback', it's a bit formal and lengthy for a UI element like a button or link. A more common and concise option would be 'Обратна повратна информација' or simply 'Коментари'. 'Support' is translated correctly as 'Подршка'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Обратна повратна информација' or 'Коментари' instead of 'Повратне информације'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses spaces instead of '&' to represent 'and'. While understandable, '&' is often preferred for consistency, especially in technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing the space between 'Povratne' and 'Podrška' with '&' for better consistency with the English source.
